document.text:
From: (USANYS)" 
To: a"JSANYS)" 
Cc: ' (USANYS)" < 
Subject: FW: SDNY raid on Little Saint James 
Date: Wed, 14 Aug 2019 18:37:56 +0000 
Inline-Images: imagel .png; image2.png; image3.png; image4.png 
(USANYS)" 
Below is an email I received from someone who has a radio broadcast in USVI. He's investigating (what he believes is) an 
ambulance which operated out of Epstein's compound. Just forwarding along, FWIW. Thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 1:35 PM 
To: (USANYS) < 
Subject: Re: SDNY raid on Little Saint James 
Mr. =, 
Thank you for the reply. On the Ambulance issue I confirmed through Ms. at USVI EMS the 
following. 
1. The vehicle has no registration of any kind. Required are Certificate of Need, ALS and BLS certification, 
Medical Director, Protocols, Staff providing care need to be USVI certified. These are huge violations of law. 
None of these requirements we even attempted to be obtained. 
2. To import a vehicle of this type, the above requirements need to be in compliance. No record if it's 
importation is on record with USVI EMS. This could mean 
A. Some corruption in customs allowed its importation. 
Or 
B. It was smuggled via shipping container. 
3. It holds a USVI license plate. Registering a vehicle of this type would be impossible, considering the above 
items. It was however able to obtain a tag from BMV. 
We confirmed through FDLE the vehicle was NOT listed on his Sex Offender Registration as his many other 
vehicles are. 
I will attach several screen shots of drone video we obtained from YouTube channel Rusty Shackleford . In the 
final picture the Ambulance appears to have been moved or removed from the property. 
This is Ms. email 
I gave her yours also. I believe they are doing an official investigation and would be glad to cooperate. I am 
available if I can be of any further help. 
Our viewers, and I think the public in general, are not happy with what happened with Epstein. As I'm sure 
SDNY is not. The questions we hear most, and are trying to answer with factual information are: 
EFTA00022633

1. Is this video an official raid? 
2. Why did it take so long? 
3. Has this, and all his properties been searched and seized? 
Answers to these questions would do much to restore the public's confidence in the investigation, as well as 
those victims yet to come forward. A statement from SDNY would be welcomed. 
Do you think a  statement will be forthcoming? If so when? Thank you again for your time and attention. 
Godspeed with the Epstein case. 
PS: You might have already done this, but the Rusty Shackleford videos showed a lot of activity going on prior to 
the raid. Think this would be valuable if evidence was being removed or destroyed. 
Regards, 
J Taylor 
I lost Traffick Report Show 
big 
EFTA00022634

Sent from my iPhone 
> On Aug 14, 2019, at 12:49 PM, 
(USANYS) 
wrote: 
> Thanks very much for the call, I'll decline to comment at this time. 
> And if you want to share any of the information , you can forward anything to this email. 
> Public Affairs 
> United States Department of Justice 
> U.S. Attorney's Office 'Southern District of New York 
'Mobile: Press Office: 
> 
----Original Message---
> From: John Taylor 
> Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 11:38 AM 
> To: =, Nicholas 
(USANYS) 
> Subject: SDNY mid on Little Saint James 
> Mr. 
> Per our phone conversation please send us a statement (press release) on the recent Task Force raid on LSJ. We also had a 
question about the seizure of that property. Just a reminder about the Ambulance. We have a source with USVI EMS who 
states this is an unregistered vehicle operating illegally, that possibly was smuggled into USVI. We have a decent bit of 
information we would be happy to share with SDNY about this. 
> 
Warmest Regards, 
> J. 
Taylor 
> Host Traffick Report 
Show 
> Sent from my iPhone 
EFTA00022635
